title: Barista and Massive Restaurants collaborate with Fudr to launch food ordering and payment app
description: Founded by technology and marketing professionals Aayush Khandpur, Prem Lokesh, Shobhit Marwah, and Akshat Khandpur, Fudr helps F&B brands build their app economies through its software as a service app builder stack that is fully integrated with POS and payment systems.
